data.prayer: Jesus, raise up prophets and truth speakers in your church in Noord-Holland, Netherlands so that the church can grow in every way into the mature body of you its head.
data.verse: Instead, speaking the truth in love, we will grow to become in every respect the mature body of him who is the head, that is, Christ.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Noord-Holland, Netherlands
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Father, let the threatened of Noord-Holland, Netherlands know that it is better to trust in you than to trust in humans.
data.verse: It is better to take refuge in the Lord than to trust in humans.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the church in the state of Noord-Holland do things that will multiply their numbers, not just add to them.
data.verse: But thanks be to God, who always leads us triumphantly as captives in Christ and through us spreads everywhere the fragrance of the knowledge of Him.

data.prayer: Father, encourage the 100,278 believers in Noord-Holland to not just be consumers of knowledge but be producers of love, mercy, kindness, and justice.
data.verse: let us not love with words or speech but with actions and in truth.

data.prayer: Father, I pray that the Japanese people will not be afraid or ashamed. Prevent them from being confounded or disappointed in their search for you. May the Japanese people know you.
Lord, give grace to the local leaders who shepherd the 100,278 believers in the state of Noord-Holland.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd. The good shepherd lays down his life for the sheep.

data.prayer: Father, please provide access to your Word for everyone, especially believers in Noord-Holland, Netherlands.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.prayer: Spirit, please convict the believers in Noord-Holland, Netherlands to not assume the ministry is for professional clergy, but for all who have been called by you.
